name: Living Room
longDesc:
You are in the living room.
There is a window that looks out onto the yard.
A large, comfortable-looking couch faces a fireplace.
There is no door to the hallway from this room, just a door to the dining room.
description:
You are in the living room.
There is a fireplace and a doorway to the dining room.

couch.name: couch
couch.description: The couch is large and well-worn, with a visible tear with stuffing coming out.
couch.discoveryStatement: You should be able to pull that stuffing out.

window.name: window
window.description: The window looks out over the yard. Through the window, you can see an eagle flying.

fireplace.name: fireplace
fireplace.description: The fireplace is connected to the large bedroom on the second floor.

couch stuffing.name: couch stuffing
couch stuffing.description: This is some stuffing from the couch. It's white a fluffy and looks softer than it feels.
